label: UCC Filing ID
description: Identifier linking this equipment item to its related UCC filing record.

label: Equipment Number
description: Internal unique ID used to track this equipment item.

label: Serial Number
description: Serial number or unique identifying number for the physical equipment item.

label: Equipment Code
description: Internal or standardized code identifying the equipment type.

label: Equipment Description
description: Description of the equipment being listed in the UCC filing.

label: Manufacturer
description: Name of the company that manufactured the equipment.

label: Model
description: Model name or number of the equipment.

label: Equipment Size
description: Size, capacity, or physical measurement of the equipment.

label: Unit of Measure
description: Unit of measure for the equipment item (e.g., unit, piece, lot).

label: Equipment Value
description: Declared dollar value of the equipment for UCC filing purposes.

label: Lease Amount
description: Lease dollar amount associated with this equipment item.

label: UCC Filing Year
description: Year associated with the UCC filing for this equipment.

label: End Year
description: End year associated with the lease, term, or coverage period for this equipment.

label: Attachment Number
description: Identifier linking the equipment entry to its related attachment record.

label: Service Provider ID
description: Identifier of the service provider associated with this equipment.

label: Assigned To (User ID)
description: User ID of the person assigned to manage this equipment record.

label: Adverse Event Flag
description: Indicates whether an adverse event is associated with this equipment item (1 = Yes, 0 = No).

label: Created At
description: Timestamp when this equipment record was created.

label: Record ID
description: Unique identifier for the equipment database record.

label: Custom Field 1
description: Customizable user-defined field for additional equipment data.

label: Custom Field 2
description: Customizable user-defined field for additional equipment data.
